messages.content: Better hospitals, Safer streets. Improved schools. Let's unlock Britain's future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: £33 billion extra for the NHS to provide better healthcare.
20,000 extra police officers to keep streets safe.
More funding for every pupil in every school, for a better education.
A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for public services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Last time we were just NINE seats short of a majority. This election your vote can just get us out of it.

issues.brexitEurope: Passing our Brexit deal which is agreed and ready to go from day one.
issues.economy: A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for public services.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school. So your child gets a better education.
issues.governance: The country needs a majority government. And you can secure it with your postal vote.
issues.health: £33 billion extra for the NHS. So your hospital and local GPs can give you the healthcare you need.

endorsements.endorsement: So I'm asking you to use your postal vote for Craig Whittaker in Calder Valley.

images.caption: Letter from Boris Johnson endorsing Craig Whittaker.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Messages emphasize moving past frustration and getting on with priorities after securing a majority government. Focuses on Brexit, healthcare, police, and education.
